description: Returns an array of stream ARNs associated with the current account and endpoint. If the TableName parameter is present, then ListStreams will return only the streams ARNs for that table.

nested_items.name: Streams
nested_items.description: A list of stream descriptors associated with the current account and endpoint.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the stream.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The DynamoDB table with which the stream is associated.

nested_items.name: StreamLabel
nested_items.description: A timestamp, in ISO 8601 format, for this stream.
the Amazon Web Services customer ID.

nested_items.name: LastEvaluatedStreamArn
nested_items.description: The stream ARN of the item where the operation stopped, inclusive of the previous result set. Use this value to start a new operation, excluding this value in the new request.
